title: Create a Project
description: Create a folder on your computer and project for all your C# code related to this investigation

validation_fields.name: workspacePath
validation_fields.label: Paste in the full path to a folder on your computer where you will keep all your C# projects for TwilioQuest

validation_fields.name: codePath
validation_fields.label: Paste in the full path to your Program.cs file in the folder you just created.
